column4: Support the Tuition Reimbursement program to include: courses enrolled in / completed.
Support the Tuition Reimbursement program to include: units enrolled in / completed.
Support the Tuition Reimbursement program to include: total cost of educational program.
Support the Tuition Reimbursement program to include: summary and detailed reports.
Support the Tuition Reimbursement program to include: higher education staff and children of staff waivers.

Track situations where employee is required to maintain employment for a certain period of time after the completion of training  and notify designated personnel when employee terminates prior to the time period (Tuition waivers).
